Recty

Handling rectangles (given through [x, y (upper-left corner), w, h] or [x, y (upper-left corner), x, y (lower-right corner)])

Authors

hoppfrosch: Original

Information
License

Properties
debug [get/set]

Debug flag for debugging the object

Value
flag

true or false

x [get/set]

Get or Set x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

Value
x

x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

See Also

xul

y [get/set]

Get or Set y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

Value
y

y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

See Also

yul

w [get/set]

Get or Set the width of the rectangle

Value
w

width of the rectangle

h [get/set]

Get or Set the height of the rectangle

Value
h

height of the rectangle

xul [get/set]

Get or Set x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

Value
xul

x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

See Also

y

yul [get/set]

Get or Set y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

Value
y

y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the rectangle

See Also

y

xlr [get/set]

Get or Set x-coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

Value
xlr

x-coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

ylr [get/set]

Get or Set y-coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

Value
ylr

y-coordinate of the lower right corner of the rectangle

Dump()

Dumps coordinates to a string

Returns

printable string containing coordinates

)

Parameters

new
)

Fills values from given Rectangle

Parameters
new

Rectangle

__New
__New(
x= 0,
y= 0,
w= 0,
h= 0,
debug= false
)

Constructor (INTERNAL)

Parameters
x,y,w,h

X,Y (upper left corner coordinates) and Width, Height of the rectangle

debug

Flag to enable debugging (Optional - Default: false)
